name: Shelf Slot Machine
description: The Best Slot Machine Using Shelfs!

blocks.command: scoreboard objectives add slot1 dummy
scoreboard objectives add slot2 dummy
scoreboard objectives add slot3 dummy
scoreboard objectives add timer dummy
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 run scoreboard players add @s timer 1
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if block ~ ~-2 ~ lever[powered=true] run scoreboard players set @s timer 1
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 1..20 store result score @s slot1 run random value 1..5
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 21 run playsound minecraft:block.dispenser.dispense ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 2 1
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 1..40 store result score @s slot2 run random value 1..5
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 41 run playsound minecraft:block.dispenser.dispense ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 2 1
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 1..60 store result score @s slot3 run random value 1..5
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 61 run playsound minecraft:block.dispenser.dispense ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 2 1
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 80 if score @s slot1 = @s slot2 if score @s slot2 = @s slot3 run give @p diamond
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches 81 if score @s slot1 = @s slot2 if score @s slot2 = @s slot3 run playsound minecraft:ui.toast.challenge_complete ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 2 1
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..60 run playsound minecraft:entity.item_frame.add_item ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 1 1
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot1 matches 1 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:0b}].id set value "minecraft:coal"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot1 matches 2 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:0b}].id set value "minecraft:iron_ingot"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot1 matches 3 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:0b}].id set value "minecraft:gold_ingot"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot1 matches 4 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:0b}].id set value "minecraft:emerald"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot1 matches 5 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:0b}].id set value "minecraft:diamond"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot2 matches 1 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:1b}].id set value "minecraft:coal"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot2 matches 2 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:1b}].id set value "minecraft:iron_ingot"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot2 matches 3 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:1b}].id set value "minecraft:gold_ingot"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot2 matches 4 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:1b}].id set value "minecraft:emerald"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot2 matches 5 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:1b}].id set value "minecraft:diamond"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot3 matches 1 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:2b}].id set value "minecraft:coal"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot3 matches 2 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:2b}].id set value "minecraft:iron_ingot"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot3 matches 3 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:2b}].id set value "minecraft:gold_ingot"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot3 matches 4 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:2b}].id set value "minecraft:emerald"
execute as @e[tag=slotMachine] at @s if score @s timer matches ..100 if score @s slot3 matches 5 run data modify block ~ ~-1 ~ Items[{Slot:2b}].id set value "minecraft:diamond"

name: Mosquito
description: Add mosquitoes to your world to troll your friends!

blocks.command: scoreboard objectives add timer dummy

give @p minecraft:vex_spawn_egg[minecraft:entity_data={id:"minecraft:vex",Tags:["mosq"],attributes:[{id:"minecraft:scale",base:0}],Silent:1b,life_ticks:1200,active_effects:[{id:"minecraft:invisibility",amplifiler:1,duration:-1,show_particles:0b}]}]

execute as @e[tag=mosq] at @s unless entity @e[tag=mosqBlock,distance=..0.25] run summon minecraft:block_display ~-.03 ~ ~-.03 {Tags:["mosqBlock"],transformation:{left_rotation:[0f,0f,0f,1f],right_rotation:[0f,0f,0f,1f],translation:[0f,0f,0f],scale:[0.0625f,0.0625f,0.0625f]},block_state:{Name:"minecraft:gray_concrete"}}
execute as @e[tag=mosqBlock] at @s unless entity @e[tag=mosq,distance=..0.25] run kill @s
execute as @e[tag=mosq] at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:player,distance=..2] run playsound minecraft:entity.bee.loop_aggressive ambient @a ~ ~ ~ .5 2
execute as @a at @s if biome ~ ~ ~ minecraft:plains run scoreboard players add @s timer 1
execute as @a at @s if score @s timer matches 20 run execute store result score @s timer run random value 21..25

execute as @a at @s if score @s timer matches 21 run summon vex ~ ~5 ~ {Tags:["mosq"],attributes:[{id:"minecraft:scale",base:0}],Silent:1b,life_ticks:1200,active_effects:[{id:"minecraft:invisibility",amplifiler:1,duration:-1,show_particles:0b}]}
execute as @a at @s if score @s timer matches 20.. run scoreboard players set @s timer 0

name: Instant Tree Chop
description: A command to chop down trees instantly!

blocks.command: scoreboard objectives add chop minecraft.used:minecraft.diamond_axe
give @p minecraft:diamond_axe[minecraft:custom_data={Chop:1}]

execute as @a at @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_axe",components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{Chop:1}}}},scores={chop=1..}] at @e[type=item,distance=..8,nbt={Age:0s},sort=nearest,limit=1] run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {NoGravity:1,Tags:["Treelocation"]}
execute as @e[tag=Treelocation] at @s if block ~ ~1 ~ #minecraft:completes_find_tree_tutorial run tp @s ~ ~1 ~
execute as @e[tag=Treelocation] at @s run fill ~2 ~ ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 air replace #minecraft:completes_find_tree_tutorial destroy
execute as @e[tag=Treelocation] at @s unless block ~ ~1 ~ #minecraft:completes_find_tree_tutorial run kill @s
execute as @a at @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_axe",components:{"minecraft:custom_dat":{Chop:1}}}},scores={chop=1..}] run scoreboard players reset @s chop

name: Pollen
description: Add pollen to Minecraft so you can enjoy watery eyes without leaving the house!

blocks.command: scoreboard objectives add pollen dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenLeaves dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenShortGrass dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenTallGrass dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenLeafLitter dummy
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenLeaves run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered #minecraft:leaves force
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenShortGrass run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered minecraft:short_grass force
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenTallGrass run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered minecraft:tall_grass force
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenLeafLitter run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered minecraft:leaf_litter force
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenLeaves matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenShortGrass matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenTallGrass matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenLeafLitter matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1

execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenLeaves matches 0 if score @s pollenShortGrass matches 0 if score @s pollenTallGrass matches 0 if score @s pollenLeafLitter matches 0 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 0
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollen matches 1 run damage @s 0.5 minecraft:generic
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollen matches 1 run particle minecraft:falling_water ~ ~2 ~ .75 .75 .75 0 250 normal

name: Happy Ghast Shoot Fireballs
description: Make It Possible For Happy Ghasts to Shoot Fireballs With Snowballs

blocks.command: execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run summon fireball ^ ^ ^1

execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=fireball,distance=..8] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run data modify entity @e[type=fireball,distance=..8,limit=1] Motion set from entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4,limit=1] Motion
execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run playsound minecraft:entity.ghast.warn ambient @a ~ ~ ~
execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run playsound minecraft:entity.ghast.shoot ambient @a ~ ~ ~
execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run kill @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4,limit=1]

name: Lightning Stick
description: A stick that can summon lightning when you hit an entity!

blocks.command: give @p stick[minecraft:custom_data={light:1},minecraft:item_name="Lightning Stick"]
scoreboard objectives add lightningDamage minecraft.custom:minecraft.damage_dealt

execute as @a at @s if entity @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:stick",components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{light:1}}}}] if score @s lightningDamage matches 1.. run execute at @e[nbt={HurtTime:10s},distance=..5,sort=nearest,limit=1] run summon minecraft:lightning_bolt ~ ~ ~
execute as @a at @s if score @s lightningDamage matches 1.. run scoreboard players reset @a

name: Lightning Bow
description: A bow that can shoot lightning arrows!

blocks.command: give @p bow[minecraft:custom_data={light:1},minecraft:item_name="Lightning Bow"]
scoreboard objectives add bow minecraft.used:minecraft.bow

execute as @a at @s if entity @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:bow",components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{light:1}}}}] if score @s bow matches 1.. run tag @e[type=arrow,distance=..2,sort=nearest,limit=1] add lightningArrow
execute as @e[tag=lightningArrow,nbt={inGround:1b}] at @s run summon minecraft:lightning_bolt ~ ~ ~
execute as @e[tag=lightningArrow,nbt={inGround:1b}] at @s run kill @s
execute as @a at @s if score @s bow matches 1.. run scoreboard players reset @s bow

name: Test Multi-Chain Layout
description: A test layout with 6 command blocks across 2 rows.

blocks.command: say Start
say Step 1
say Step 2
say Step 3
say Step 4
say Done
command
command 2
command 3
